physical_appearance: This is a cushion cover. It is square in shape, with a multicolored geometric scrolling border, and a cotton weave in the center.  The cotton weave features a stylized embroidery of two parrots and two peacocks facing each other, with a potted plant in the middleand four small animals alongside them.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) birds (motifs) beadwork (visual works) cushions
